# seqera_organization_member (Data Source)

Look up an organization member by email.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email` (String) Email address of the member to look up.
- `org_id` (Number) Organization numeric identifier.

### Read-Only

- `avatar` (String) Avatar URL of the member.
- `first_name` (String) First name of the member.
- `last_name` (String) Last name of the member.
- `member_id` (Number) Organization member numeric identifier.
- `role` (String) Role of the member (owner, member, collaborator).
- `user_id` (Number) User numeric identifier.
- `user_name` (String) Username of the member.
